name: Walker Sighting
Lore: '''Echo station, 3TA. We have spotted Imperial walkers.'' A Rebel tactic is to put as much ground as possible between walkers and Rebel troops, allowing time to prepare a defense.',
Text: 'If opponent just moved or deployed an AT-AT to a planet site, search your Reserve Deck for up to three exterior sites of that planet and immediately deploy them.  Shuffle, cut and replace.',
